summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the functionality, configuration handling, and numerical behavior of a multistep diffusion scheduler, covering aspects such as noise handling, prediction modes, solver order, timestep management, variance and thresholding strategies, and integration with model pipelines.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the diffusion scheduler component used in AI generative models, supporting reliable deployment and further development of diffusion-based applications.
